feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Scheduler
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Scheduler

entry.content: VPC Service Controls support for Cloud Scheduler jobs has been extended to Google Cloud APIs that are VPC Service Controls-compliant. For more information, see Secure cron jobs with VPC Service Controls.
entry.summary: VPC Service Controls now support Cloud Scheduler jobs for Google Cloud APIs that are compatible with VPC Service Controls.
entry.title: Changed: VPC SC support for Cloud Scheduler
